C++:
void main(){
int a=5;
int b=1;
if (b<10)
   a = ~(a+b);
}


MIPS:
addi $s0, $s0, 5
addi $s1, $s1, 1
slti $t0, $s1, 10
beq $t0, $zero, exit
nor $s0, $s0, $s1
exit:


00100010000100000000000000000101
00100010001100010000000000000001
00101010001010000000000000001010
00010001000000000000000000000001
00000010000100011000000000100111
